recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions
While pasta cooks, cut pancetta into small cubes and fry until crispy
In a bowl, whisk eggs and grated cheeses together
Drain pasta, reserving some pasta water
Mix hot pasta with egg mixture and pancetta
Add pasta water if needed for creaminess
Season with fresh black pepper and serve immediately
